name: The Lust City
description:
Adult game full of adventure, exploration, suspense and intimacy. You’re a seasoned explorer on a mission with your expedition crew into the deep jungle. You seek an ancient temple lost to time, and you’re certain you can find it–especially with the support of your crew.



However, the jungle has a way of distorting one’s goals, and obscuring the path. Will you and your crew find the temple lost to time, or something else entirely...








Game Content:
  • 7800+ IMAGES
  • 640+ ANIMATIONS.

Gameplay:
  • Sound Effects for Animations
  • Dialogue choice
  • Branching story
  • Scene navigation
  • Scene replay gallery
  • Premium image gallery
  • Primal vision (nude mode)
  • And more..

WARNING!
This game features adult content and some content that some users might find offensive the game might include topics that you may have a sensitivity to such as sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse.
